author: Ron Allen
title: Brooklyn nursing home ravaged by 55 deaths, most in New York during pandemic
description: "We are doing it alone," the facility CEO says, praising staff efforts in the face of shortages, lack of support during the coronavirus outbreak.
content: Right here, we are doing it alone," Cobble Hill Health Center CEO Donny Tuchman shouted Monday to cheering neighbors outside the Brooklyn nursing home. These people right here, he said pointing to the line of the health care staff in full protective gear whod… [+5437 chars]
